long_description: The Patagonia Maui Lace shoes feature handsome full-grain leather uppers that are ready to take on the town. Cushioned EVA midsoles ensure lasting comfort, step after step. Durable full-grain leather uppers feature moisture-wicking mesh linings for lasting comfort in warm conditions. EVA midsoles are made from 20% recycled EVA, and supply cushioning and protection for comfortable wear; air cushions increase comfort. Outsoles on the Patagonia Maui Lace shoes are made from high-abrasion EVA for lightweight traction.
short_description: The Patagonia Maui Lace shoes feature handsome full-grain leather uppers that are ready to take on the town. Cushioned EVA midsoles ensure lasting comfort, step after step.
